attributes.action: That Prisoners who have committed murder can not claim incapacity benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prisoners who have committed the most vile crimes are claiming incapacity benefits whilst serving prison sentenences. The DSS  state that to claim this Benefit you are unable to work.Whilst in Prison the Jobs given to Prisoners are not in the DSS Catorgories.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
